content:
Save the Date for March 2022 CCDA Implementation-A-Thon (IAT)

The next virtual C-CDA Implementation-A-Thon is scheduled for Wednesday and Thursday, March 23rd and 24th! If you have a topic you would like to know more about or to share with the community, visit https://confluence.hl7.org/display/IAT/Topic+Suggestions+for+2022.03+C-CDA+IAT and we will be in touch.

As a result of a recommendation from the C-CDA community, the C-CDA Implementation-A-Thon has been moved to March 30-31.

Registration is open: https://www.hl7.org/events/c-cda/implementation/2022/03/

Please join us!
